normalized: one day in july.
m.
, chinese standard time.
the skies above the south china sea.

transport aircraft c-130s, ultra hercules.

name: pilot
normalized: 『okay.
latitude 10°24', longitude 114°26'.
climate tropical, area 0.
43 square kilometres.
long, level island to the east and west.

name: pilot

a smile on her lips.

name: asuka
normalized: roger!
asuka descending!
bashu!

as the drop pod asuka was riding in pierced through the clouds like an arrow shot from the moon, it was gliding towards its target.

name: asuka
normalized: “in steady descent”…♪

normalized: 『we're really relying on you!

now, asuka was gliding through the air, just straddling the bike-like cockpit.
and then――

name: asuka
normalized: separate!
asuka flung off her mask and parted from the cockpit without hesitation.
her body became all alone, and she nose dived even faster as it was struck by the wind.
the cockpit that asuka had abandoned spurted out compressed air, and broke away in the opposite direction to her.
it would give off loud radio waves in order to make the enemy anti-aircraft radar receive fraudulent information.

name: asuka
normalized: now, then――

name: asuka
normalized: hah!
put strength into her extremities.

the limbs, which had been produced through a combination of the scientific technology of man and the medical technology of hell, boosted the power of that ability many times over.
she didn't even need enough time to blink.

name: asuka
normalized: “wind god・soar”

name: asuka
normalized: landing!
falling a distance of thirty thousand feet in the blink of an eye, asuka safely landed on the runway of the taihei island base.

it was a plunging nose dive so particular to asuka that it was impossible even for dwellers of hell who possessed flying abilities, and which a flesh-and-blood human would certainly need a parachute or flight unit for.
even so, the targeted taihei island base suddenly became noisy.
blending into the fiercely-blowing wind, an alarm could be heard from the base.

name: asuka
normalized: oh well, guess i'm found out～♪

the majority of the facility was underground, and it was said the chinese union's vaunted product of hellish technology, the 『strengthened human unit』 was stationed there.
the objective of the drop assault this time was to acquire data about those strengthened humans, through asuka fighting them in person.
